YAMLConfig.name: roleEventSearchConfig
YAMLConfig.YamlText:
searchConfigDescriptors:
RoleChanged: searchEventConfigDescriptors: - property: name,displayName,displayableName,type,sysDescriptions,activationDate,deactivationDate searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: oldValue - property: newValue - property: owner searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: oldValue - property: newValue - property: qryProperty1 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /id/oldValue - property: qryProperty2 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /id/newValue - property: attributes,extendedAttributes,extendedAttributesIdentity,extendedAttributesNamed searchPropertyConfigDescriptors: - property: oldValue - property: newValue - property: qryProperty1 jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /attributeType - property: propertyName jsonSource: eventDetails attributePath: /attributeName
